1:
[[ -f "/opt/bitnami/scripts/git/entrypoint.sh" ]] && source "/opt/bitnami/scripts/git/entrypoint.sh"
cd /app && git config --global --add safe.directory $(pwd)
while true; do
    cd /app && git pull origin main
    sleep 60
done

/hr/tccr.io-truecharts-cloudflared.title: cloudflared helm release
/hr/tccr.io-truecharts-cloudflared.name: cloudflared
/hr/tccr.io-truecharts-cloudflared.doc: Cloudflared is a lightweight proxy client for securely connecting applications to Cloudflares network. It powers Cloudflare Tunnel, allowing services to be exposed without opening ports or configuring firewall rules. cloudflared routes traffic through Cloudflares global network, enhancing security with DDoS protection, authentication, and encrypted connections. It supports HTTP, TCP, and QUIC, making it ideal for self-hosted services, remote access, and zero-trust networking.

/hr/ghcr.io-home-operations-charts-mirro.title: longhorn helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-home-operations-charts-mirro.name: longhorn
/hr/ghcr.io-home-operations-charts-mirro.doc: Longhorn is an open-source, distributed block storage system for Kubernetes. It provides a fast and reliable solution for persistent storage, making it an ideal choice for a wide range of use cases, including stateful applications, databases, and more.

/hr/ghcr.io-home-operations-charts-mirro.title: metallb helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-home-operations-charts-mirro.name: metallb
/hr/ghcr.io-home-operations-charts-mirro.doc: metallb is a load-balancer implementation for Kubernetes, allowing you to create services with type: LoadBalancer. With BGP, you can setup IP ranges in your network that get assigned to k8s services. You can use IP addresses that are assigned to you, and share them amongst services.

0:
- job_name: 'ipmi'
  metrics_path: '/metrics'
  static_configs:
  - targets:
    - nas.home:9290
- job_name: 'node-exporter'
  static_configs:
  - targets:
    - opnsense.home:9100
    - nas.home:9100
- job_name: 'smartctl'
  metrics_path: '/metrics'
  static_configs:
  - targets:
    - nas.home:9633
